Out of the studio! ü§çüñ§

We are out of the studio and will be unavailable by phone and email from July 21 to 30. If your loved one is to pass in this time and you are interested in receiving a memorial, please be sure that your loved one is kept frozen in any standard freezer while arrangements are made. Freezing your loved one is the best way to keep their body preserved while making decisions and plans on how to proceed. Thank you so much for your understanding and trust. Be back soon!

Fur

Using only fur clippings, you can have a memorial of your pet to touch and cherish.

Fur preservation is one of the most versatile methods of preserving and remembering your pet. Families choose to remember their pets through shaped fur; paw, tail, or complete pelt preservation; whisker and fur clippings; felted balls; and leather-free coat preservation.

Our Mission

Precious Creature exists in order to provide compassionate and judgement-free pet taxidermy, aftercare, memorial, and preservation services for individuals and families.
